attributes.title: VIRUS! WILL GLITCH YOUR PHONE!
attributes.review: Horrible app! Right after downloading it my phone became attacked with a virus, messing with its functions. It began to randomly power off at least 3 times EVERY HOUR. The up volume button does not even do anything anymore & the screen will randomly start glitching whenever I use it for more than 5 minutes at a time. ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE. This app will mess up your phone! If I could give it negative stars I would!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD! 0/5 stars!!

attributes.title: This app is just a no
attributes.review: Iâ€™m a Donald trump supporter but this app is just a no no as soon as I downloaded this app my phone started glitching and it got a virus and there was so many commercials and my phone completely freaked out this app needs to be deleted and looking at the other reviews it did the same thing and everyone wants this app deleted so just delete it the app should not be here if it is causing this much problems

attributes.title: Would Give Zero Stars if possible
attributes.review: Horrible glitching. Likes to crash all the time and drains my battery. The app even says that it can track my location without using it??? Not cool. Not to mention the horrible images on display once you open the app. Would recommend steering clear if you want to avoid NSFW images displayed on your phone. Absolutely horrid. I canâ€™t believe this is allowed to still be an app. APPLE TAKE DOWN THIS DISGUSTING DISPLAY EWWWW.

attributes.title: Absolute crap.
attributes.review: I opened the app and was unexplainably displeased. After about 2 minutes of looking through this app, my eyes burned up like I just poured a whole bottle of hot sauce in them. If you are going to make an app and say itâ€™s for news purposes, then do so. I don't want fake news and to be informed of false statements and unproved theories. The very last thing I wanted was to see were posts of a puffy cheeto acting like he has something good to show off.

attributes.title: Horrible ğŸ¤¢
attributes.review:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

The bee, of course, flies anyway

because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

Barry! Breakfast is ready!

Ooming!

Hang on a second.

Hello?

- Barry?
- Adam?

- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

Looking sharp.

Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

Sorry. I'm excited.

Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

A perfect report card, all B's.

Very proud.

Ma! I got a thing going here.

- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

attributes.title: ğŸ¤¡
attributes.review: This app physically made me ill, went to the doctor and they couldnâ€™t figure out what was wrong with me. Weeks went by and I went back for a follow up appointment, and it turns out I had aids. They told me the only way to rid of the disease was to delete the app. After weeks of denial I finally went through with it, and I have become stronger by the day. Please, do not download this app, and if you do, please remember that it can result in aids.
